name: Naked Skater - Bro Edition
description:
*** CAUTION: HIGHLY ADDICTIVE AND REALLY HARD ***

Are you ready for the ultimate Naked Skating challenge?

If you like Naked Skater : Bro Edition try out Naked Skater : Chick Edition!

The new Naked Skater Bro Edition is now on your iPhone, iPod and iPad!

Tap on your device to make Bro ollie over the jumps. Keep on avoiding obstacles to level up and lose items of clothing!

PLUS... Smash your friends high score in Game Center! How high a score can you get??

There are 10 items of closing to take off:
- Wooly Hat (2 jumps)
- Yellow Scarf (4 jumps)
- Green Long Sleeved Top (7 jumps)
- Leather Belt (10 jumps)
- Red Shoes (15 jumps) PLUS a Scene Change!!
- White T Shirt (20 jumps)
- Trousers (30 jumps)
- Little Red Pants (50 jumps)

and..... way more upgrades to come!

Good Luck!!
